channel.title: OpenSUSE OBS cracked
channel.description:
OpenSUSE's infrastructure was breached including their online build system and no one knows what the attackers did.
Projects like qTox and Retroshare are affected AFAICT
https://lists.opensuse.org/opensuse-announce/2017-05/msg00000.html
